desc: Create great water memories with your family and friends. The Rosso Floating Water Mat is built for lakes, boats, beaches, pools, cottages or oceans. It weighs only 30 lbs, but it's designed to support up to 1500 pounds of distributed weight. Start enjoying the summer on the water.

layout.text: Rosso Water Mat. For Water Recreation.

Fits 6-8 adults. No set up required. Perfect for lakes, oceans, and pools. Tear and fade resistant. Good for boating and docking.
Limited-time summer offer. Get a Rosso Water Mat for only for $399.
Apply promocode "SUMMER50" when buying 2 or more water mats for an additional $50 off your purchase.
